column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Wow . "
#Text=Zuko says : " I understand . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Their fire was beautiful .
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " Yes .
#Text=They judged you , and gave you visions of the meaning of firebending .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I ca n't believe there are still living dragons .
#Text=My uncle Iroh said he faced the last dragon and killed it .
#Text=" Aang says : " So your uncle lied .
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " Actually , it was n't a total lie .
#Text=Iroh was the last outsider to face the masters .
#Text=They deemed him worthy and passed the secret onto him as well .
#Text=" Zuko says : " He must have lied to protect them , so no one else would hunt them .
#Text=" Aang says : " All this time , I thought firebending was destruction .
#Text=Since I hurt Katara , I 've been too afraid and hesitant .
#Text=But now I know what it really is ... it 's energy , and life .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah .
#Text=It 's like the Sun , but inside of you .
#Text=Do you guys realize this ?
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " Well , our civilization is called the Sun Warriors ... so yeah .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's why my firebending was so weak before .
#Text=Because for so many years , hunting you was my drive ... it was my purpose .
#Text=So when I joined you , I lost sight of my inner fire .
#Text=But now , I have a new drive .
#Text=I have to help you defeat my father and restore balance to the world .
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " Now that you have learned the secrets , and you know about our tribe 's existence , we have no choice but to imprison you here forever .
#Text=Just kidding .
#Text=But seriously , do n't tell anyone !
#Text="
